

<h1> How to Update SQLite </h1>

<pre>
fossil pull https://sqlite.org/src --project-code 2ab58778c2967968b94284e989e43dc11791f548
fossil up hctree
fossil merge trunk
</pre>

<h1> How to Test Hctree </h1>

<pre>
./testfixture ../trunk/test/testrunner.tcl hct
./testfixture ../trunk/test/testrunner.tcl hct%
./testfixture ../trunk/test/testrunner.tcl

./hct_thread_test -nidx 2 +16
</pre>

<h1> How to Update hctree-bedrock Branch </h1>

<pre>
fossil up hctree-bedrock
fossil merge hctree
</pre>

Then run the same test procedure as for the hctree branch.
